comment: Absolutely frustrated! Every time I find something I love, it's sold out in my size. What's the point of having a wishlist if nothing is ever available?
Your search function is terrible. I typed 'red lipstick' and got foundation results. How am I supposed to find anything on this site?
The foundation shade looked completely different online vs what I received. This is the third time this has happened - I'm done with CosmoBrand.
I had 500 points and couldn't figure out how to use them. Your loyalty program is unnecessarily complicated and customer service couldn't even explain it properly.
Mobile app crashes every time I try to checkout. I've lost my cart contents multiple times. This is unacceptable in 2025.
My shade is ALWAYS out of stock. I've been trying to reorder my foundation for 3 weeks now. Time to find a new brand that actually keeps products in stock.
The filters don't work properly. I select 'cruelty-free' and still get products that aren't. Your product categorization is a mess.
Ordered a 'berry' lip color that arrived as bright orange. The photos on your site are completely misleading. Very disappointed.
Waited 4 days for a response to my email, only to get a generic copy-paste reply that didn't address my issue at all. Terrible service.
Promo code worked at checkout but didn't apply the discount. Had to contact support multiple times to get it sorted. Your site has serious technical issues.
Been waiting 6 weeks for a restock notification on my usual concealer shade. This happens with every product I want to repurchase.
Thought I qualified for free shipping with my membership but got charged anyway. Your terms and conditions are confusing and misleading.
Paid for express shipping and it took 2 weeks to arrive. Customer service just kept giving me tracking updates that didn't match reality.
Can't find products by ingredient list. As someone with sensitive skin, this makes shopping here impossible. Your search needs major improvements.
The eyeshadow palette colors look nothing like the swatches on your website. This is false advertising at this point.
Cart keeps emptying itself when I switch between pages. I've had to start over 5 times trying to place one order.
Received a completely shattered compact. Packaging was fine, so this was clearly a quality control issue. Very disappointing.
Your shade range is pathetic. As a POC, I can never find anything that matches my skin tone. Do better.
Live chat agent kept asking me to repeat information I'd already provided. Felt like they weren't even reading my messages.
Missed out on a 30% off sale because I didn't know I needed to activate my membership discount separately. Your system is needlessly complex.
Product recommendations are completely off. I buy skincare and you keep showing me hair products. Your algorithm needs work.
International shipping to Canada took over a month. For the prices you charge, this is completely unacceptable.
Desktop site won't let me complete checkout - button just spins endlessly. Had to use a different browser entirely.
Product description said 'long-lasting' but the lipstick barely stayed on for an hour. Complete misrepresentation.
Return process requires 5 different steps and approval from customer service. Just wanted to exchange a wrong shade - shouldn't be this hard.
Popular items sell out instantly and take months to restock. Your inventory management is terrible.
Got hit with unexpected customs fees that doubled my order cost. Should have been disclosed before checkout.
Site navigation is confusing. Took me 20 minutes to find the moisturizer section. Needs a complete UX overhaul.
Points expired without warning. Nowhere on the site does it clearly state the expiration policy. Lost $50 worth of rewards.
Payment processing fails randomly. Sometimes works, sometimes doesn't. Very frustrating shopping experience.
Mascara was supposed to be waterproof but smudged immediately in light rain. Product claims are unreliable.
Support team doesn't seem trained on your own products. Asked about an ingredient and they had no clue.
XS sizes are always sold out. Feels like you only stock for average sizes and ignore petite customers.
Package got lost twice and customer service acted like it was my fault. Terrible logistics management.
Ordered nude lipstick, received bright red. Quality control is non-existent. This is basic order fulfillment.
Search results are completely random. Looking for 'foundation' brings up nail polish. Makes no sense.
Mobile site constantly redirects to desktop version which doesn't work on phones. Technical incompetence.
Spent $200 expecting to hit VIP status but apparently I needed to spend it in one order, not cumulative. Rules are unclear.
Serum texture was completely different from description. Said lightweight, received thick cream. Very misleading.
Have to pay return shipping for defective products. This should be covered by the company, not the customer.
New collection launched but half the shades were already sold out on day one. Poor stock planning.
Shipping to UK resulted in unexpected VAT charges. Website should calculate total cost including taxes upfront.
Submitted a complaint 2 weeks ago and still no response. Customer service is completely overwhelmed or just ignoring customers.
Product pages don't show compatible items or suggestions. Shopping here feels like wandering in the dark.
Checkout process times out frequently, losing all my information. Have to start over each time.
Standard shipping took 3 weeks within the same country. Amazon delivers in 2 days - your logistics are stuck in the past.
Bronzer shade appeared warm-toned online but arrived cool-toned. Photography and color accuracy are terrible.
Plus sizes are rarely available and when they are, there's no size variety. Feels discriminatory.
Birthday discount didn't work during checkout. Support said it expired but I never received an expiration notice.
Site crashes during every major sale. Can't handle traffic spikes which defeats the purpose of having promotions.
Palette arrived with 3 broken shades. Packaging was intact so this happened before shipping. Poor quality control.
Can't sort by price or customer ratings. Basic e-commerce features are missing from your site.
Chat bot is useless and getting to a human takes forever. When you finally do, they can't help with anything complex.
Return window is only 14 days but shipping takes 10 days. Barely have time to test products before return period expires.
Medium shades are always out but you have plenty of light and dark. Your stocking algorithm needs work.
Expedited shipping cost extra but arrived later than standard shipping from other brands. Complete waste of money.
Blush intensity in photos vs reality is completely different. What looks subtle online is clown-like in person.
Wishlist items disappear randomly. Can't keep track of products I want to purchase later.
Order got held at customs for weeks because of incorrect paperwork from your end. Completely avoidable delay.
Triple points promotion didn't apply to my order. Fine print is buried so deep you need a magnifying glass to find exclusions.
No way to filter by skin type or concerns. For a beauty brand, this is a fundamental failure.
Support keeps closing my tickets without resolution. Have to keep reopening the same issue multiple times.
Password reset emails never arrive. Can't access my account and customer service can't help without security verification.
Sample sizes are never available when I want to try before buying full size. Forces risky purchases.
Liquid foundation leaked all over other products during shipping. Poor packaging design ruined my entire order.
Tracking information is never accurate. Package shows as delivered but arrives 3 days later.
Concealer coverage was described as full but barely covers anything. Product performance claims are exaggerated.
Need original packaging to return but your packaging is designed to be opened destructively. Catch-22 situation.
Member-exclusive early access didn't work for my account. Support said I'm not eligible but never explained why.
New arrivals section hasn't been updated in months. How am I supposed to discover your latest products?
Product reviews don't load half the time. Can't make informed decisions without seeing other customers' experiences.
Restock notifications never work. Sign up to be notified but never receive emails when items come back.
Phone support has 45+ minute wait times. By the time someone answers, I've forgotten why I called.
Charged duties on a return shipment. Having to pay to send back your defective product is insulting.
Rural delivery takes twice as long as promised. Your shipping partners clearly don't prioritize smaller locations.
Skin tone in model photos doesn't match mine but product was recommended for my complexion. Very misleading marketing.
App notifications for sales never work. Miss out on deals because your push notifications are broken.
Trending section shows the same products for months. Algorithm seems completely static and unhelpful.
Stacked a member discount with a promo code but only one applied. Rules about combining offers are unclear.
Pressed powder arrived completely pulverized. This keeps happening - you need better protective packaging.
Travel sizes sell out faster than full sizes but aren't restocked as frequently. Poor inventory balance.
Exchange process requires me to place a new order and wait for refund. Why can't you just swap the items directly?
Social media team responds faster than official customer service. That's backwards and unprofessional.
Saved payment methods keep getting deleted. Have to re-enter card details for every single order.
Premium shipping costs more than the product but still takes a week. What exactly am I paying premium for?
Shimmer eyeshadow looked subtle online but it's pure glitter bomb. Completely unusable for everyday wear.
My VIP early access to new shades is useless because everything sells out before I can use my member discount. Poor coordination between teams.
Search function crashes when I try to use multiple filters. Can't find anything specific on this broken site.
Ordered matte lipstick but received glossy formula, and it was already used! Quality control and accuracy are both terrible.
Support won't process my return because they claim I'm past the deadline, but they took 5 days to respond to my initial request. Circular logic.
Order confirmation email never arrived, so I placed the order twice. Now I have duplicates and your shipping is too slow to cancel the second order.
Can't filter by available sizes only, so I waste time browsing sold-out items. Your site shows me what I can't buy.
Points balance shows different amounts on mobile vs desktop. Can't trust your system to track rewards properly.
Foundation oxidized to orange but support insists it's 'normal color variation.' Photos on site don't show this happening.
International order took 6 weeks and came with surprise fees that weren't disclosed. Shipping experience is awful for overseas customers.
Broken compact arrived but return process requires photos, receipts, and manager approval. Just send me a replacement - it's obviously defective.
Shade matching tool recommended a color that's permanently out of stock. Why suggest unavailable products?
Member-exclusive products are impossible to find on the site. If I can't locate them, what's the point of VIP access?
App keeps logging me out mid-checkout. Support says it's my phone's fault but it only happens on your app.
Package arrived late and half the products were missing. Your logistics are completely broken.
Product weight was wrong on customs forms, causing additional fees. Even your international documentation is inaccurate.
Can't use reward points on sale items, and can't return items bought with points. Your policies are designed to trap customers.
Restock notification system is broken, customer service can't fix it, and my shade has been out of stock for 2 months. Triple failure.
Spent forever finding a product, description was wrong, and shipping took 3 weeks. Every aspect of shopping here is problematic.
Loyalty points didn't apply due to site glitch, and when the wrong item arrived, I lost the points entirely. System is completely unreliable.
